Subject: Welcome to Maison Albion - Your Wedding Journey Begins
Body Content: Thank you for your inquiry about hosting your wedding at Maison Albion. We are thrilled to help you plan your special day!

Subject: Ready to See Maison Albion? Schedule Your Private Tour
Body Content: Hi {{contact.firstName}}, we would love to show you around our venue. Would you like to schedule a private tour?

Subject: Your Wedding Venue Guide
Body Content: Hi! Here is the link to our wedding venue brochure: https://maisonalbion.com/wedding-guide

Subject: Inside your Cameron Estate wedding, {{first_name}}
Body Content: Hi there {{first_name}}, Congratulations! I imagine you are hearing from quite a few venues right now, so let me share what makes Cameron Estate different. We are a historic inn (more than 225 years old!) where your entire wedding unfolds in one place. Your ceremony, reception, and guest accommodations—all here on the estate. No coordinating multiple vendors across town. No transportation logistics. Just you, your people, and a beautiful weekend together. What is included: One transparent per-person price includes your ceremony space, reception venue, complete catering, full bar service, tables, linens, china, glassware, and our team orchestrating every detail. No separate venue rental fee. No hidden costs appearing weeks before your wedding. Ready to visit? View our complete details and pricing: https://cameronestateinn.com/2026 https://cameronestateinn.com/2027 To schedule your private tour, simply reply with 2-3 dates and times that work for you. Warmly, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: Lisa from Cameron Estate
Body Content: {{first_name}}, Hi! This is Lisa from Cameron Estate Inn. I just sent over our wedding information and pricing—everything should be in your inbox now. If texting is easier for questions, I am happy to answer here. Congratulations again on your engagement! - Lisa

Subject: Questions about Cameron Estate
Body Content: Hi {{first_name}}, what questions can I answer about Cameron Estate? Most couples want to know about pricing, availability, or what is included in our all-inclusive packages. I am here to help! - Lisa

Subject: A few things I wish every couple knew before touring venues
Body Content: {{first_name}}, You are probably about to visit several venues over the next few weeks. Here is what I encourage couples to focus on instead—the stuff that actually affects your wedding day. Trust your gut when you walk in. Get clarity on what all-inclusive actually means. Think about what the planning process will actually feel like. Want to see how this works at Cameron Estate? I would love to show you around. Best, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: We knew within minutes
Body Content: {{first_name}}, When couples tour Cameron Estate, they often tell me they knew within the first few minutes whether it was right for them. Here is what three recent couples told me about their decision. Ready to schedule your tour? Just reply with a few dates that work for you. Warmly, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: Exploring venues
Body Content: {{first_name}}, I know you are probably looking at several venues right now. If Cameron Estate should be on your tour list, I would love to find a time that works. - Lisa

Subject: What would make touring easier
Body Content: Hi {{first_name}}, what would make touring Cameron Estate easier for you? Weekend availability? Evening tours? Virtual walkthrough first? Let me know how I can help. - Lisa

Subject: {{first_name}}, can you see it?
Body Content: {{first_name}}, When you picture your wedding day—really picture it—where are you? Can you see yourself walking down an aisle surrounded by trees? That feeling—that is what matters. Our calendar is filling up. Just reply with 2-3 dates that work for you. Warmly, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: We made you a Pinterest board
Body Content: {{first_name}}, Quick question: What does your dream wedding look like? Romantic and soft? Bold and dramatic? Classic elegance? Here is our Pinterest board with real weddings from Cameron Estate. Happy pinning! Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: Pinterest board
Body Content: {{first_name}}, have you had a chance to check out our Pinterest board yet? Would love to hear more about your color palette! - Lisa

Subject: What all-inclusive really means at Cameron Estate
Body Content: {{first_name}}, You are probably seeing all-inclusive at every venue. Let me show you exactly what it means at Cameron Estate. What is included: Venue spaces, plated dinner, champagne toast, premium open bar, all rentals, staffing, and coordination. What you handle separately: Flowers, photography, music, cake, invitations. The difference? One person at one place. Best, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: Questions about availability
Body Content: {{first_name}}, what questions can I answer about Cameron Estate? Deposits? Availability? Timeline? I am happy to help! - Lisa

Subject: Questions couples ask at this stage
Body Content: {{first_name}}, Twelve days into your venue search, most couples are asking similar questions. What if we find something better? Is the pricing really final? What if we need to cancel? How do we know it is the right choice? Questions I did not anticipate? Let us talk. Best, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: Last note from Lisa
Body Content: {{first_name}}, this is my last note. If you would like to see Cameron Estate, I am here anytime. If you have chosen another direction, I wish you the very best. Congratulations on your wedding! - Lisa

Subject: Questions couples ask at this stage
Body Content: {{first_name}}, Twelve days into your venue search, most couples are asking similar questions. What if we find something better? Is the pricing really final? What if we need to cancel? How do we know it is the right choice? What happens next if we book? I am happy to walk through a sample budget comparison. Take your time. Good decisions are not rushed. Best, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831

Subject: Wishing you the best, {{first_name}}
Body Content: {{first_name}}, I have not heard from you over the past two weeks, which tells me you have likely found your perfect venue or are exploring other directions. I wanted to close our conversation properly, with genuine best wishes for your wedding celebration—wherever it takes place. Thank you for considering Cameron Estate. Warmly, Lisa Wedding Specialist Cameron Estate Inn 717-725-4831
